languages.text: {n}Воительница отвечает холодным взглядом.{/n} "Я — тень Домин. Если он{mf||а} скажет, я буду защищать тебя. Если велит — отведу к Неумирающему".
{n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."
languages.original_text: {n}Воительница отвечает холодным взглядом.{/n} "Я — тень Домин. Если он{mf||а} скажет, я буду защищать тебя. Если велит — отведу к Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."
{n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

{n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."
{n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah le mira con frialdad.{/n} «Soy la sombra de mi Domin. Si me lo ordena, le protegeré. Si me lo ordena, le enviaré al encuentro del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah le mira con frialdad.{/n} «Soy la sombra de mi Domin. Si me lo ordena, le protegeré. Si me lo ordena, le enviaré al encuentro del Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}キベラは彼に冷たい視線を送った。{/n}「私はドミンの影です。もし{mf|彼|彼女}がそう言うのなら、私はあなたを守りましょう。もし{mf|彼|彼女}がそう言うのなら、私はあなたを不死の者の前に差し出しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは彼に冷たい視線を送った。{/n}「私はドミンの影です。もし{mf|彼|彼女}がそう言うのなら、私はあなたを守りましょう。もし{mf|彼|彼女}がそう言うのなら、私はあなたを不死の者の前に差し出しましょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈冷冰冰地向他致意。{/n}“我是秘者的影子，只要{mf|他|她}开口，我就会保护你。同样，只要{mf|他|她}开口，我就会送你去见不死之神。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈冷冰冰地向他致意。{/n}“我是秘者的影子，只要{mf|他|她}开口，我就会保护你。同样，只要{mf|他|她}开口，我就会送你去见不死之神。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah mustert ihn kalt.{/n} "Ich bin der Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin. Wenn {mf|er|sie} es sagt, beschütze ich Euch. Wenn {mf|er|sie} es sagt, bringe ich Euch zum Todlosen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah mustert ihn kalt.{/n} "Ich bin der Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin. Wenn {mf|er|sie} es sagt, beschütze ich Euch. Wenn {mf|er|sie} es sagt, bringe ich Euch zum Todlosen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah le regarde froidement.{/n} « Je suis l'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin. Si tel est son désir, je vous protégerai. Si tel est son désir, je vous enverrai rejoindre l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah regards him coldly.{/n} "I am the Domin's shadow. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will protect you. If {mf|he|she} says the word, I will take you to the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah le regarde froidement.{/n} « Je suis l'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin. Si tel est son désir, je vous protégerai. Si tel est son désir, je vous enverrai rejoindre l'Immortel. »
